news.title: Cross sets up Littler tie, Anderson wins thriller
news.description: Rob Cross brushes aside Damon Heta to set up a tie against defending champion Luke Littler at the PDC World Championship.

news.title: Ex-England batter and ECB boss Morris dies
news.description: Hugh Morris, the former England and Glamorgan batter and England and Wales Cricket Board chief executive, has died at the age of 62.

news.title: Ex-England striker Carroll due in court after arrest
news.description: Former Newcastle United, Liverpool and England forward Andy Carroll is due to appear in court on Tuesday after he was charged with breaching a non-molestation order.

news.title: How releasing Reijnders gave Man City win at Forest
news.description: Match of the Day's Alan Shearer analyses the half-time tactical tweak from Manchester City which released Tijani Reijnders into attacking areas and gave City a vital 2-1 win at Nottingham Forest.

news.title: Head 'reached out' to Duckett after video
news.description: Australia opener Travis Head says he reached out to England counterpart Ben Duckett after a video emerged on social media prior to the Melbourne Test.
